Head.Effect: You are struck in the eye. You have Disadvantage on Awareness (Sight) and Ranged Tests for 1 hour.
The blow floods your vision with flashing lights. You are Stunned until the end of your next turn.
You suffer a laceration to the cheek. You are Bleeding.
Head.Treatment: A Routine (+20) Medicae Test to stop the bleeding; application of bandages; or the laceration will close naturally after 1 hour.

Head.Effect: The attack slices your ear, leaving your ears ringing. You are Deafened until the end of your next turn, and are Bleeding.
Head.Treatment: A Challenging (+0) Medicae Test to stop the Bleeding; application of bandages; or the laceration will close naturally after 1 hour.

Head.Effect: The blow dislocates your jaw, dislocating your jaw. You are Stunned until the start of your next turn.
Head.Treatment: A Challenging (+0) Medicae Test to pop the jaw back into place.

Head.Effect: You are struck in the head, causing blood to run down your face and impair your vision. You are Blinded and Bleeding.
Head.Treatment: A Challenging (+0) Medicae Test to stop the Bleeding; application of bandages; or the laceration will close naturally after 1 hour.

Head.Effect: You are hit in the eye, causing serious damage. You are Bleeding, and have Disadvantage on Awareness (Sight) Tests. If you only have one eye, you are Blinded.
Head.Treatment: A Difficult (-10) Medicae Test to treat the eye and stop the Bleeding.

Head.Effect: The blow strikes you in the ear or otherwise damages your ear drums. You are Deafened. If you suffer this result again, your hearing is permanently lost.
Head.Treatment: A Difficult (-10) Medicae Test, usually using drugs to reduce swelling and inflammation in the ear.

Head.Effect: The blow smashes out several teeth. You are Bleeding and must make a Challenging (+0) Fortitude (Pain) Test or also fall Prone.
Head.Treatment: A Difficult (-10) Medicae Test performed by someone with the Chirurgeon Talent or similar expertise.

Head.Effect: The blow tears your ear apart. You are Deafened and Bleeding (Major). You must make a Challenging (+0) Fortitude (Pain) Test. On a success you are Stunned until the end of your next turn; on a failure you are Incapacitated until the end of your next turn and fall Prone.
Head.Treatment: A Hard (-20) Medicae Test using a chirurgeon’s kit to stop the Bleeding.

Head.Effect: The blow tears your ear apart. You are Deafened and Bleeding (Major). You must make a Challenging (+0) Fortitude (Pain) Test or also gain the Stunned Condition until the end of your next turn.
Head.Treatment: A Very Hard (-30) Medicae Test performed by someone with the Chirurgeon Talent or similar expertise.

Head.Effect: You take a concussive blow to the head. You are Deafened and Stunned for 1 minute, and are Bleeding.
Head.Treatment: A Hard (-20) Medicae Test using a chirurgeon’s kit to stop the Bleeding and restore hearing.

Head.Effect: A strike to your eye causes it to burst. You are Bleeding (Major), and have Disadvantage on Awareness (Sight) Tests. If you only have one eye, you are Blinded.
Head.Treatment: A Very Hard (-30) Medicae Test performed by someone with the Chirurgeon Talent or similar expertise.

Head.Effect: The blow shatters your jaw and destroys your tongue, sending teeth flying. You are Bleeding (Major). You must make a Challenging (+0) Fortitude (Pain) Test. On a success you are Stunned until the start of your next turn; on a failure you are Incapacitated until the end of your next turn and fall Prone. Additionally, your jaw is shattered, and you suffer the Broken Bone (Major) Injury to your jaw.
Head.Treatment: A Very Hard (-30) Medicae Test performed by someone with the Chirurgeon Talent or similar expertise.

Head.Effect: Your head is caved in or erupts in a shower of bone and gore. You are dead.

Arm.Effect: You are struck in the wrist, jarring your hand. Drop any item held in the hand.
You are struck by a rattling blow in your arm, causing it to temporarily go numb. You have Disadvantage on all Tests using the arm for 1 minute.
You suffer a laceration to the arm. You are Bleeding.
Arm.Treatment: A Routine (+20) Medicae Test to stop the bleeding; application of bandages; or the laceration will close naturally after 1 hour.

Arm.Effect: Your hand is sliced open, sending jolts of pain through your arm. You are Bleeding and drop any item held in the hand.
Arm.Treatment: A Challenging (+0) Medicae Test to stop the Bleeding; application of bandages; or the laceration will close naturally after 1 hour.

Arm.Effect: The strike dislocates your shoulder from the socket. The arm is useless until popped back into place. At the start of each turn while you have a dislocated shoulder you must make a Challenging (+0) Fortitude (Pain) Test. On a failure, you are Stunned until the start of your next turn.
Arm.Treatment: A Challenging (+0) Medicae Test to pop the shoulder back into place.

Arm.Effect: The attack tears off one of your fingers. You are Bleeding (Major).
Arm.Treatment: A Challenging (+0) Medicae Test performed by someone with the Chirurgeon Talent.

Arm.Effect: The attack fractures a bone in your arm. Your arm is completely useless, and you drop any item held in the hand. Additionally, you must make a Challenging (+0) Fortitude (Pain) Test or be Stunned for one minute.
Arm.Treatment: A Difficult (-10) Medicae Test to treat shock. This Test does not count as treating the broken bone.

Arm.Effect: You suffer a deep gash on your arm, reducing your effectiveness. You are Bleeding (Major) and have Disadvantage on all Tests using the arm.
Arm.Treatment: A Difficult (-10) Medicae Test using a chirurgeon’s kit to stop the Bleeding.

Arm.Effect: The blow devastates your hand, breaking bones and potentially severing fingers. You are Bleeding (Major) and immediately drop any item held in the hand. Additionally, you lose 1d10 – 5 fingers. If your result is 0, you manage to keep all of your digits. Otherwise, you suffer the Amputation (Fingers) Injury.
Arm.Treatment: A Difficult (-10) Medicae Test performed by someone with the Chirurgeon Talent.

Arm.Effect: The attack shatters the bones in your elbow. Your arm is completely useless, and you immediately drop any item held in the hand. Additionally, you must make a Difficult (-10) Fortitude (Pain) Test or be Stunned for one minute.
Arm.Treatment: A Hard (-20) Medicae Test to treat shock. This Test does not count as treating the broken bone.

Arm.Effect: Your hand is played apart, causing a major injury and severing fingers. You are Bleeding (Major) and Stunned for 1 hour. Additionally, you must make a Difficult (-10) Fortitude (Pain) Test or be Stunned for one minute.
Arm.Treatment: A Hard (-20) Medicae Test performed by someone with the Chirurgeon Talent or similar expertise.

Arm.Effect: You suffer a serious wound to a major artery. You are Bleeding (Major), Fatigued from blood loss, your arm is completely useless, and you immediately drop any item held in the hand.
Arm.Treatment: A Hard (-20) Medicae Test using a chirurgeon’s kit to stop the Bleeding.

Arm.Effect: Your hand is taken clean off. You are Bleeding (Major) and Stunned for 1 hour.
Arm.Treatment: A Very Hard (-30) Medicae Test performed by someone with the Chirurgeon Talent or similar expertise.

Arm.Effect: Your arm is mangled and torn apart, with only the barest piece of flesh attaching it to your body. Your arm is completely useless, and you drop any item held in the hand. Additionally, you must make a Very Hard (-30) Fortitude (Pain) Test or be Stunned for 1 hour. If you suffer any further Damage to the arm, you automatically suffer the Brutal Dismemberment Critical Wound and die.
Arm.Treatment: A Very Hard (-30) Medicae Test performed by someone with the Chirurgeon Talent or similar expertise to fully remove the arm.

Arm.Effect: Your arm is completely destroyed and torn from your body, causing shock and catastrophic blood loss. You are dead.

Body.Effect: The blow knocks the wind out of you. You are Stunned until the end of your next turn.
You are struck in a sensitive area. You must make a Challenging (+0) Fortitude (Pain) Test or fall Prone.
You suffer a laceration to the body. You are Bleeding.
Body.Treatment: A Routine (+20) Medicae Test to stop the bleeding; application of bandages; or the laceration will close naturally after 1 hour.

Body.Effect: You are hit hard in the stomach. You are Bleeding and knocked Prone.
Body.Treatment: A Challenging (+0) Medicae Test to stop the Bleeding; application of bandages; or the laceration will close naturally after 1 hour.

Body.Effect: The attack cracks one of your ribs. You have Disadvantage on Strength and Agility Tests, and your Move is reduced one step.
You are thrown back by the force of the blow. You are Stunned for 1 minute and are Bleeding.
Body.Treatment: A Challenging (+0) Medicae Test performed by someone with the Chirurgeon Talent.

Body.Effect: The attack fractures your collarbone — determine randomly if this is on your left or right. You drop any item held in the hand on that side and have Disadvantage on all Tests using the arm. Additionally, you must make a Challenging (+0) Fortitude (Pain) Test or be Stunned for one minute.
Body.Treatment: A Difficult (-10) Medicae Test to treat shock. This Test does not count as treating the broken bone.

Body.Effect: You suffer a deep cut on your lower abdomen, which makes it difficult to move. You are Bleeding (Major), and your Speed is reduced one step.
Body.Treatment: A Difficult (-10) Medicae Test using a chirurgeon’s kit to stop the Bleeding.

Body.Effect: The attack shatters a bone in your hip. You are Bleeding (Major), and have Disadvantage on Tests that rely on mobility, and your Move is reduced one step. Additionally, you must make a Challenging (+0) Fortitude (Pain) Test or be Stunned for one minute.
Body.Treatment: A Difficult (-10) Medicae Test performed by someone with the Chirurgeon Talent.

Body.Effect: The attack shatters multiple ribs, leaving shards of bone peppered throughout your flesh. You have Disadvantage on any physical Test, and your Move is reduced two steps to a minimum of Slow.
Body.Treatment: A Difficult (-10) Medicae Test to treat shock. This Test does not count as treating the broken bone.

Body.Effect: The attack punctures your lung, perhaps embedding shrapnel, a bullet, or a fragment of your own bone. You gain a Fatigued Condition and a Bleeding (Major) Condition.
Body.Treatment: A Difficult (-10) Medicae Test performed by someone with the Chirurgeon Talent.

Body.Effect: You suffer a serious wound to a major artery. You are Bleeding (Major), Fatigued from blood loss, your arm is completely useless, and you immediately drop any item held in the hand.
Body.Treatment: A Hard (-20) Medicae Test using a chirurgeon’s kit to stop the Bleeding.

Body.Effect: Your flesh is mangled and torn apart, with only the barest piece of flesh attaching it to your body. Your arm is completely useless, and you drop any item held in the hand. Additionally, you must make a Very Hard (-30) Fortitude (Pain) Test or be Stunned for 1 hour. If you suffer any further Damage to the arm, you automatically suffer the Brutal Dismemberment Critical Wound and die.
Body.Treatment: A Very Hard (-30) Medicae Test performed by someone with the Chirurgeon Talent or similar expertise.

Body.Effect: You suffer a substantial injury to your spine, making it difficult to stand and move; you are Bleeding (Major) and Prone.
Body.Treatment: A Very Hard (-30) Medicae Test performed by someone with the Chirurgeon Talent or similar expertise.

Body.Effect: You are split in two or otherwise torn apart. Creatures within Short Range are showered in blood and gore. You are dead.
